item.title: L’Oréal introduces a flexible skin sensor that tracks sun exposure
item.description:
Source: L’Oréal. Model wearing a My UV patch. L’Oréal recently introduced My UV Patch at the Consumer Electronics Show. It is the first flexible skin sensor designed to track UV exposure and promote sun-safety awareness among consumers. This innovation arrives as sun exposure has become a significant health concern, with 90% of non-melanoma skin cancers linked to ultraviolet (UV) radiation from the sun, in addition to skin pigmentation and premature aging...
